Patch Set 3: (1 inline comment)

Patch Set 3: (1 inline comment)

Can you add a test to glance/tests/functional/db/base for this functionality too?

Another thing, I'd love to see a "mysql explain" on the sql query that is generated when you pass a tag in to the v2 api. I'm probably just being paranoid, but it would be nice to be sure we're not adding a full table scan if that query filter is used.

We probably want  "docImpact" in the commit message as well.

And one note inline.

Thanks, this seems like an important feature for v2! And its probably nicely scoped for landing in H-3.

Patch Set 6:

@markwash, below is the "mysql explain" per your request.

mysql> explain SELECT anon_1.anon_2_images_created_at AS anon_1_anon_2_images_created_at, anon_1.anon_2_images_updated_at AS anon_1_anon_2_images_updated_at, anon_1.anon_2_images_deleted_at AS anon_1_anon_2_images_deleted_at, anon_1.anon_2_images_deleted AS anon_1_anon_2_images_deleted, anon_1.anon_2_images_id AS anon_1_anon_2_images_id, anon_1.anon_2_images_name AS anon_1_anon_2_images_name, anon_1.anon_2_images_disk_format AS anon_1_anon_2_images_disk_format, anon_1.anon_2_images_container_format AS anon_1_anon_2_images_container_format, anon_1.anon_2_images_size AS anon_1_anon_2_images_size, anon_1.anon_2_images_status AS anon_1_anon_2_images_status, anon_1.anon_2_images_is_public AS anon_1_anon_2_images_is_public, anon_1.anon_2_images_checksum AS anon_1_anon_2_images_checksum, anon_1.anon_2_images_min_disk AS anon_1_anon_2_images_min_disk, anon_1.anon_2_images_min_ram AS anon_1_anon_2_images_min_ram, anon_1.anon_2_images_owner AS anon_1_anon_2_images_owner, anon_1.anon_2_images_protected AS anon_1_anon_2_images_protected, image_locations_1.created_at AS image_locations_1_created_at, image_locations_1.updated_at AS image_locations_1_updated_at, image_locations_1.deleted_at AS image_locations_1_deleted_at, image_locations_1.deleted AS image_locations_1_deleted, image_locations_1.id AS image_locations_1_id, image_locations_1.image_id AS image_locations_1_image_id, image_locations_1.value AS image_locations_1_value, image_locations_1.meta_data AS image_locations_1_meta_data, image_properties_1.created_at AS image_properties_1_created_at, image_properties_1.updated_at AS image_properties_1_updated_at, image_properties_1.deleted_at AS image_properties_1_deleted_at, image_properties_1.deleted AS image_properties_1_deleted, image_properties_1.id AS image_properties_1_id, image_properties_1.image_id AS image_properties_1_image_id, image_properties_1.name AS image_properties_1_name, image_properties_1.value AS image_properties_1_value FROM (SELECT anon_2.images_created_at AS anon_2_images_created_at, anon_2.images_updated_at AS anon_2_images_updated_at, anon_2.images_deleted_at AS anon_2_images_deleted_at, anon_2.images_deleted AS anon_2_images_deleted, anon_2.images_id AS anon_2_images_id, anon_2.images_name AS anon_2_images_name, anon_2.images_disk_format AS anon_2_images_disk_format, anon_2.images_container_format AS anon_2_images_container_format, anon_2.images_size AS anon_2_images_size, anon_2.images_status AS anon_2_images_status, anon_2.images_is_public AS anon_2_images_is_public, anon_2.images_checksum AS anon_2_images_checksum, anon_2.images_min_disk AS anon_2_images_min_disk, anon_2.images_min_ram AS anon_2_images_min_ram, anon_2.images_owner AS anon_2_images_owner, anon_2.images_protected AS anon_2_images_protected FROM (SELECT images.created_at AS images_created_at, images.updated_at AS images_updated_at, images.deleted_at AS images_deleted_at, images.deleted AS images_deleted, images.id AS images_id, images.name AS images_name, images.disk_format AS images_disk_format, images.container_format AS images_container_format, images.size AS images_size, images.status AS images_status, images.is_public AS images_is_public, images.checksum AS images_checksum, images.min_disk AS images_min_disk, images.min_ram AS images_min_ram, images.owner AS images_owner, images.protected AS images_protected FROM images UNION SELECT images.created_at AS images_created_at, images.updated_at AS images_updated_at, images.deleted_at AS images_deleted_at, images.deleted AS images_deleted, images.id AS images_id, images.name AS images_name, images.disk_format AS images_disk_format, images.container_format AS images_container_format, images.size AS images_size, images.status AS images_status, images.is_public AS images_is_public, images.checksum AS images_checksum, images.min_disk AS images_min_disk, images.min_ram AS images_min_ram, images.owner AS images_owner, images.protected AS images_protected FROM images INNER JOIN image_members ON images.id = image_members.image_id) AS anon_2 WHERE anon_2.images_deleted = 0 AND anon_2.images_status != '' AND (EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM image_tags WHERE anon_2.images_id = image_tags.image_id AND image_tags.deleted = 0 AND image_tags.value = 'x86')) AND (EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM image_tags WHERE anon_2.images_id = image_tags.image_id AND image_tags.deleted = 0 AND image_tags.value = '64bit')) ORDER BY anon_2.images_created_at DESC, anon_2.images_created_at DESC, anon_2.images_id DESC LIMIT 100) AS anon_1 LEFT OUTER JOIN image_locations AS image_locations_1 ON anon_1.anon_2_images_id = image_locations_1.image_id LEFT OUTER JOIN image_properties AS image_properties_1 ON anon_1.anon_2_images_id = image_properties_1.image_id ORDER BY anon_1.anon_2_images_created_at DESC, anon_1.anon_2_images_created_at DESC, anon_1.anon_2_images_id DESC;
+----+--------------------+--------------------+--------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------+---------+-------------------------------+------+-----------------------------+
| id | select_type        | table              | type   | possible_keys                                                                                           | key                          | key_len | ref                           | rows | Extra                       |
+----+--------------------+--------------------+--------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------+---------+-------------------------------+------+-----------------------------+
|  1 | PRIMARY            | <derived2>         | system | NULL                                                                                                    | NULL                         | NULL    | NULL                          |    1 |                             |
|  1 | PRIMARY            | image_locations_1  | ref    | ix_image_locations_image_id                                                                             | ix_image_locations_image_id  | 110     | const                         |    0 |                             |
|  1 | PRIMARY            | image_properties_1 | ref    | image_id,ix_image_properties_image_id_name,ix_image_properties_image_id                                 | ix_image_properties_image_id | 110     | const                         |    0 |                             |
|  2 | DERIVED            | <derived3>         | ALL    | NULL                                                                                                    | NULL                         | NULL    | NULL                          |    3 | Using where; Using filesort |
|  6 | DEPENDENT SUBQUERY | image_tags         | ref    | ix_image_tags_image_id,ix_image_tags_image_id_tag_value                                                 | ix_image_tags_image_id       | 110     | anon_2.images_id              |    1 | Using where                 |
|  5 | DEPENDENT SUBQUERY | image_tags         | ref    | ix_image_tags_image_id,ix_image_tags_image_id_tag_value                                                 | ix_image_tags_image_id       | 110     | anon_2.images_id              |    1 | Using where                 |
|  3 | DERIVED            | images             | ALL    | NULL                                                                                                    | NULL                         | NULL    | NULL                          |    3 |                             |
|  4 | UNION              | image_members      | index  | image_members_image_id_member_deleted_at_key,ix_image_members_image_id,ix_image_members_image_id_member | ix_image_members_image_id    | 110     | NULL                          |    1 | Using index                 |
|  4 | UNION              | images             | eq_ref | PRIMARY                                                                                                 | PRIMARY                      | 110     | glance.image_members.image_id |    1 |                             |
| NULL | UNION RESULT       | <union3,4>         | ALL    | NULL                                                                                                    | NULL                         | NULL    | NULL                          | NULL |                             |
+----+--------------------+--------------------+--------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------+---------+-------------------------------+------+-----------------------------+
10 rows in set (0.00 sec)

mysql>
